name: WarBirds Dogfights
description: Strap into the pilots seat and fight in the great air battles of World War II. But you aren't alone. You'll have a wingman, or maybe a whole squadron around you, engaging small or large groups of enemies over Europe, North Africa, and the Pacific.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8, 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Joystick recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Joystick recommended
